reviewText: It was watchable but the whole movie had static. I have a ton of VHS and none of them are the quality of this one. Don't waste your money.

I watched this tape over and over when I was a child & I still can't get enough of it.  Every aspect of this video, from the voices and illustrations to the songs and the morals, is impeccable.  A must see for  the young and the young at heart.  The EPITOME of enjoyable, worthwhile  children's entertainment! You will enjoy it as much as your children do  ~:o)

"Puff & The Incredible Mister Nobody" tells the story of the struggle and ultimate triumph of a gifted child.  It's another superb film by Romeo Muller, who also wrote the classic Animagic, Rankin/Bass Christmas  films "Rudolph, the Red-Nosed Reindeer" and "Frosty the  Snowman," among many other dazzling tales.
